text: 1:9 Galesia 3:19; 5:23Ezɨ e uaghan kamaghɨn fo, God uan Araziba isa gumazamizir aghuiba bagha da anɨngizir pu. Puvatɨ, a gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amiba bagha, da me ganɨngi. Gumazamizir akaba batoziba, ko akaba barazir puvatɨziba, ko gumazir akɨrim ragha God gasaraziba, merara God me bagha uan Araziba anɨngi. Kar gumazamizir Godɨn ziam fer puvatɨziba, ko gumazamizir Godɨn aghuaziba, ko gumazamizir uan amebaba ko afeziaba mɨsoghezɨ me aremeziba, ko gumazamizir igharaz darazi mɨsozima me ariaghireziba,
